room_title: Escape room "A Very Potter Escape Room" by Trapped Puzzle Rooms in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: A group of coworkers did the "Very Potter" room. My 5th time doing one of these and this one was by far the funnest!

room_title: Escape room "A Very Potter Escape Room" by Trapped Puzzle Rooms in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: We did the Harry Potter escape room and it was awesome! Such a cool room and was just challenging enough. Will definitely be trying more rooms!

room_title: Escape room "A Very Potter Escape Room" by Trapped Puzzle Rooms in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: The details in the Very Potter room were incredible! There were so many different aspects to the puzzles that it kept us on our toes to the very last minute. Would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a fun event.

room_title: Escape room "A Very Potter Escape Room" by Trapped Puzzle Rooms in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: My friends and I completed the A Very Potter Escape last night, and it was an excellent experience from start to finish. From the minute we walked in everyone was extremely nice, funny, and entertaining while they were explaining how everything worked. No spoilers, but the room was beautifully decorated and the attention to detail was superb.They'll definitely see my friends and me back for the others!

room_title: Escape room "A Very Potter Escape Room" by Trapped Puzzle Rooms in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Our family completed A Very Potter Escape Room yesterday, and the attention to detail is fantastic! Our hosts were very kind and patient and knowledgeable and gave valuable hints. We booked half of the room for our family and wound up working with a really nice group. Very worthwhile experience, and I liked the opportunity for the group picture at the end.
